mapper.select: SELECT s.stu_id stuId, s.stu_num stuNum, s.stu_id stuId, s.stu_period stuPeriod, s.stu_name stuName, s.stu_class stuClass FROM stu_user s LEFT JOIN tea_stu_rel ts ON s.stu_id = ts.stu_id WHERE ts.tea_id = #{teaId} AND ts.status = '00' ORDER BY s.stu_id

SELECT s.stu_id stuId, s.stu_num stuNum, s.stu_name stuName, s.stu_class stuClass, s.stu_tel stuTel, s.one_machine_score, s.two_machine_score, s.three_machine_score, s.four_machine_score, s.five_machine_score, s.six_machine_score, CASE s.one_ms_STATUS WHEN '00' THEN '已提交' WHEN '01' THEN '暂存状态' ELSE '未录入' END AS oneMsStatus, CASE s.two_ms_STATUS WHEN '00' THEN '已提交' WHEN '01' THEN '暂存状态' ELSE '未录入' END AS twoMsStatus, CASE s.three_ms_STATUS WHEN '00' THEN '已提交' WHEN '01' THEN '暂存状态' ELSE '未录入' END AS threeMsStatus, CASE s.four_ms_STATUS WHEN '00' THEN '已提交' WHEN '01' THEN '暂存状态' ELSE '未录入' END AS fourMsStatus, CASE s.five_ms_STATUS WHEN '00' THEN '已提交' WHEN '01' THEN '暂存状态' ELSE '未录入' END AS fiveMsStatus, CASE s.six_ms_STATUS WHEN '00' THEN '已提交' WHEN '01' THEN '暂存状态' ELSE '未录入' END AS sixMsStatus, CASE s.ir_STATUS WHEN '00' THEN '已提交' WHEN '01' THEN '暂存状态' ELSE '未录入' END AS irStatus FROM stu_user s WHERE s.stu_period = (select year(now())-1) ORDER BY s.stu_id

SELECT s.stu_id stuId, s.stu_num stuNum, s.stu_name stuName, s.stu_class stuClass, s.stu_tel stuTel, COALESCE (s.one_machine_score,'') oneMachineScore, COALESCE (s.two_machine_score,'') twoMachineScore, COALESCE (s.three_machine_score,'') threeMachineScore, COALESCE (s.four_machine_score,'') fourMachineScore, COALESCE (s.five_machine_score,'') fiveMachineScore, COALESCE (s.six_machine_score,'') sixMachineScore, COALESCE (s.interview_result,'') interviewResult, COALESCE (s.machine_score,'') machineScore FROM stu_user s WHERE s.stu_id = #{stuId}
